title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: New Animated Adventures, Volume 1
description: Spinning straight out of the hit Nickelodeon cartoon comes an all-new, all-ages TMNT book perfect for fans both old and new! Four fantastic tales pin the Turtles against villains new and old like Snakeweed, the Shredder, and a horde of zombies?
author: Kenny Byerly
